alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 5:23AM CDT until April 19 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Polk County in central Iowa... Western Jasper County in central Iowa... North central Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 523 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pleasant Hill, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Altoona and Bondurant around 530 AM CDT. Mitchellville around 540 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Colfax, Prairie City, Valeria, Prairie City Krohn Airport, Mingo, Newton and Lambs Grove. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 142 and 166. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
